TenantSecurityNotification.name: TenantSecurityNotification
TenantSecurityNotification.description: Stores information about notifications that were triggered in Security Center as a function of the Alerts feature. For more information, see Create Alerts for Security Changes.

MetricCount.description: The metric count that triggered the notification.

MetricIdentifier.description: The ID of the type of metric that was counted.

MetricsType.description: The metric for which the notification was sent.

Name.description: The name of the triggered notification rule.

NotificationDate.description: The date and time that the notification was sent.

NotificationType.description: The type of notification sent. For example, a Chatter feed or push notification.

Operator.description: The quantity of metrics used to measure.

RecipientEmails.description: The email addresses of the recipients who receive security notifications.

RuleName.description: The name of the notification rule.

Tenant.description: The ID of the tenant for which the notification was triggered.

TenantName.description: The org name of the tenant for which the notification was triggered.

Threshold.description: The threshold value that triggered the notification.

TriggerType.description: The type of trigger that set off the notification. For example, a security change was made.
